page.title: 07Social Concerns
page.content: Social Concern (continued) ========================== and many outings to the seaside and theatres etc. are arranged for their pleasure. There is also a volunteer bureau which has about fifty drivers, all carrying out community work, such as taking people to hospital,chiropodists,special schools and day centres. The latter being very useful for the elderly who wish to live in their own homes but need some help during the day. the drivers give their time freely but are paid a milage which helps with petrol and maintenance.
